The intervention , call IntelliCare , use mobile application continuously collect patient data adapt intervention content motivational message create highly tailored user-responsive treatment system . During RCT study , 270 participant Major Depression and/or Anxiety use IntelliCare apps 8 week invite complete online questionnaire four follow-up time point : week 4 8 study program , month 3 6 study program end . All participant first undergo initial assessment include telephone interview series online questionnaires mood .
